name: 1GAW - Week 3
description:
Note: This is a small prototype just for the sake of practicing making levels in the Unity engine. I made this in a few hours.

This is a very very very tiny prototype where I wanted to experiment with Unity's lighting and fog options, to see if I could create an underwater environment.

I honestly lost interest halfway through so this isn't my best work at all. For the sake of uploading a game a week though, I'm still uploading it here in case anyone is curious. There's literally just a ship and like a flashing light.

Source code: https://github.com/Reccy/1GAW_3

Controls:

W - Move Forward
S - Move Backward
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Q - Move Up
E - Move Down

I - Pitch Down
K - Pitch Up
J - Yaw Left
L - Yaw Right
U - Roll Left
O - Roll Right

ALT+F4 - Quit

Assets Used:

Submarine Model:

https://free3d.com/3d-model/mini-submarine-725226.html
